packagegui.name: netsnmptrapdtraphandles
packagegui.title: NET-SNMP Trap Daemon

field.description:
Trap Handle entries define programs or scripts to execute when a trap is received by snmptrapd from a user or community authorization source with the "execute" Process Type selected.

Details from the incoming trap are passed via standard input, with metadata in the environment such as the hostname and how the trap arrived. For more information about data available to trap handles, consult the snmptrapd.conf manual page.
Full path to the Trap Handle program or script
